name: PACE (Mohamed ElShab)
description:
PACE

A cube got blocked in a place where it's trapped and surrounded by four gates of hell, the gates release explosive balls that explodes on impact and kills it's target after some hits.

Choose from difficulties: Normal, Hard or Extreme

The goal is to survive as long as you can. 

I hope you like my game :)

If you have any improvements that you hope to be made just type in the comments section or email me on: Cinosmoh@gmail.com

Don't forget to give my game a rating and support me to continue making games by donating ;)
